ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] authorizationId with data type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveDateRange with data type Time Interval
Contains exactly one [1..1] priorAuthorizationIdAssigned with data type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] requestBasis with data type Code

Contains exactly one [1..1] supportingDocumentation with data type String
Contains zero or one [0..1] authorizedRepresentative, where its type is Agent
